data.eml:eml: On a new species of Micrambe from Africa (Coleoptera, Cryptophagidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Otero, Jose Carlos, Pereira, Jose Manuel (2018): On a new species of Micrambe from Africa (Coleoptera, Cryptophagidae). ZooKeys 748: 47-56, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.748.23856, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.748.23856
